attributes.additional_details: The reason I’d like this to happen is to prevent sexual harassment and assault against women at gyms all over the country. Many of us feel unsafe in normal gyms. I also feel this would help people with social anxiety and a fear of being harassed. Too many women have suffered, from non consensual videos/photos being taken of them when they’re only trying to exercise, to groping and staring. I believe making women’s only gyms more accessible would help with this issue and would encourage exercise.
attributes.background: To urge gyms to open more women’s only sections and/or to place more women’s only gyms around the country

rejection.details: This is a decision for individual providers.
